Camila Nieto

About me

My name is Camila Nieto. Doing web pages that reach perfection is my goal. I love to create astonishing websites that make the user comfortable with their appearance and functionality. I live in Colombia, in a small city called Zipaquir√°. I am bilingual (fluent in Spanish and English languages).

I am a graduate of Centennial College (Toronto, Canada) in the program of Software Engineering Technician. Recently I finished the Professional Certificate in Computer Science for Web Programming at Harvard University, Massachusetts. Right now, I am studying at MIT University (Massachusetts Institute of Technology) for the professional certificate in coding: Full Stack Development with MERN.

Additionally, I hope to be a Full Stack developer one day. Desire to learn new things, constance, discipline and perseverance are the words that define me.

Projects

Here are some projects that I made along the way. Any of these projects are official websites... Please check them out!

ANIMAL RESCUE

A responsive webpage for adoption shelters. This website uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Python (Flask), and PostgreSQL.

KMI HOMES

A responsive webpage perfect to showcase houses/apartments for sale. This webpage uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

LANDHOP

A responsive webpage perfect for tourists and travelers. This website uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Python (Django), and SQLite.
